DOC.brief_summary: An efficacy and safety study of ezetimibe (+) simvastatin compared to atorvastatin at week 6 in diabetics or metabolic syndrome patients in Korea.
DOC.brief_title: Ezetimibe (+) Simvastatin vs. Atorvastatin Comparative Study in DM or Metabolic Syndrome Patients (0653A-093)
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of hypercholesterolemia Drug naive or statin treated but inadequately controlled patients against NCEP ATP III guideline goal Hypersensitivity to HMGCoA inhibitor or Ezetimibe
